definitions.definition: A section of a written work containing citations , not quotations , to all the books referred to in the work.
A list of books or documents relevant to a particular subject or author.
The study of the history of books in terms of their classification , printing and publication .

main_definition: A section of a written work containing citations , not quotations , to all the books referred to in the work.
secondary_definitions: A list of books or documents relevant to a particular subject or author.
The study of the history of books in terms of their classification , printing and publication .
